thread.title: Need help with my itinerary - Tamilnadu
thread.title_full: Need help with my itinerary - Tamilnadu

author: New tourist
title: Need help with my itinerary - Tamilnadu
text: # 1 Hello, I am planning a trip in December for 8-9 days and below is the route that I have chalked out. Chennai - Kanchipuram - Muthanoor - Thiruvanamallai - Chidambaram - Pondicherry - Mahabalipuram - Chennai. My main interest is temples and famous monuments along with crocodile park and any other interesting stuff for kids (6 and 2 ) Kindly suggest any alterations, places that can be added or dropped.. Thank you
